TestCase.name: testHintedBroadcastJoin
TestCase.Resource: SELECT /*+ USE_BROADCAST(MyTable1) */ c, g FROM MyTable2, MyTable1 WHERE a = d AND d < 2

LogicalProject(c=[$7], g=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=($5, $0), <($0, 2))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[c, g]) +- HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a, d)], select=[d, g, a, c], isBroadcast=[true], build=[right]) :- Calc(select=[d, g], where=[<(d, 2)]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h]) +- Exchange(distribution=[broadcast]) +- Calc(select=[a, c]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testHintedMultiJoins
TestCase.Resource: SELECT /*+ use_broadcast(MyTable1), use_nl(MyTable3) */ c, g, z FROM MyTable2, MyTable1, MyTable3 WHERE a = x AND a = d AND d < 2

LogicalProject(c=[$7], g=[$3], z=[$10]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=($5, $8), =($5, $0), <($0, 2))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) : :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable3, source: [TestTableSource(x, y, z)]]])

Calc(select=[c, g, z]) +- NestedLoopJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a, x)], select=[g, a, c, x, z], build=[right]) :- Calc(select=[g, a, c]) : +- HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a, d)], select=[d, g, a, c], isBroadcast=[true], build=[right]) : :- Calc(select=[d, g], where=[<(d, 2)]) : : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h]) : +- Exchange(distribution=[broadcast]) : +- Calc(select=[a, c]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[broadcast]) +- Calc(select=[x, z]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable3, source: [TestTableSource(x, y, z)]]], fields=[x, y, z])
